name: Lumerin
introduce: Lumerin Protocol is a peer-to-peer platform that enables data stream routing based on smart contract rules. Using the Lumerin Protocol, any asset that is delivered via a TCP/IP connection, can be combined with real-time Oracles to support the asset creator in maximizing buyer access across any number of multiple delivery channels. The Lumerin Protocol will make Bitcoin/POW hashrate a tradable, liquid financial asset, unlocking mining profitability and providing greater access to capital.
